thread.title: Three bodies found in Sharjah oil tank | GulfNews.com
thread.title_full: Three bodies found in Sharjah oil tank | GulfNews.com

author: Aghaddir Ali
title: Three bodies found in Sharjah oil tank | GulfNews.com
text:
Sharjah Police are investigating the death of three workers whose bodies were found in an oil tank in Al Saja Industrial Area in Sharjah. 
The Police operation room received a call late on Saturday night reporting the incident. 
The bodies of the Asian workers, aged 20, 23, and 47, were pulled out and transferred to a forensic laboratory for autopsies to determine cause of death. 
Police investigations are continuing.
